00089     void
00090     FeedforwardPropagationRunner::run(Neuron* _neuron)
00091     {
00092         BOOST_FOREACH( Link& link, _neuron->links )
00093         {
00094             if(link.getDirection() == Link::in)
00095                 _neuron->receptiveField += link.getTo()->activationValue * link.getWeight()->value;
00096         }
00097 
00098         _neuron->activationValue = _neuron->getActivationFunction()->f(_neuron->receptiveField);
00099         _neuron->receptiveField = 0;
00100     } //run
00101

00105         return ForwardRun;
00106     } //getDirection
